mapper.select: select *from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into pj_like (id, pw, signupDate,isActive,member_grade,member_num) values (#{id},#{pw}, current_date,1,1,member_seq.NEXTVAL)
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, pw=#{pw}, nickname=#{nickname} where member_num=#{member_num}
